1.「よく来てくれたでンス。 | どうぐ使いとして さらに強くなったようで| さすが: Thank you for coming. It seems that you have|become even stronger as an item master, as|expected of <pc>.

2.「ちょっと お話が あるでンスから| こっちへ 来てほしいでンスよ。: I'd like to have a word with you, so I'd like|you to come this way.

3.「ご主人さまをさらった 隊長ゴルゴンザでンスが| 当分は 魔界に戻れないと思うで: Gorgonza, the captain who kidnapped the|master, will not be able to return to Demon|World for a while.

4.「というのも 魔界に戻るためには| 魔界へ通じる門を開く必要が あるでンスが|: In order to return to Demon World, it is|necessary to open the gate to Demon World, but|this will take a lot of time.

5.「今頃 奴らは この世界のどこかで| 魔界への門を 開いているはずでンスよ……。: They must have opened the gate to Demon World|somewhere in this world by now.

6.「この間に ご主人さまを 助けなくては| ならないでンスが 今の <pc>さんで: In the meantime, we must save our master, but|we cannot defeat Gorgonza with our current|<pc>. ...

7.「でも ご主人さまが編み出した| どうぐ使いの必殺技を 習得すれば| きっと 勝: But if you learn the item master's special|technique, you'll have a better chance of|winning.

8.「お願いでンス <pc>さん。| ゴルゴンザに勝つために 必殺技を| 習得しても: Please, please <pc>. Could you please|learn a special move to beat Gorgonza?

9.「魔物を従えている状態で| ゴブル砂漠西などにいる <%sEV_QUE_NAME: I want you to defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0>|<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Goble Desert West etc.|with monsters in tow.

10.「必殺技を習得するには この特訓が| どうしても 必要になるでンス。| それでは: This training is necessary to master the|special moves. Then, I look forward to working|with you.

11.「ご主人さまが編み出した どうぐ使いの必殺技を| 習得すれば 隊長ゴルゴンザとの: If he could master the item master's special|technique, he would have a chance to win the|battle against Captain Gorgonza.

12.「ただ その前に 必殺技習得の準備として| やってきてほしいことが あるでンスよ: But before that, there is something I want you|to do as preparation for learning special|moves.

13.「魔物を従えている状態で| ゴブル砂漠西などにいる <%sEV_QUE_NAME: I want you to defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0>|<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Goble Desert West etc.|with monsters in tow.

14.「必殺技を習得するには この特訓が| どうしても 必要になるでンスよ……。| <: I really need this training to master the|special moves... <pc>. Best regards,|<pc>.

15.「おお！ 特訓をこなしたでンスね！| では 最後の仕上げでンスよ！: Oh! You've done your training! Now let's put|the finishing touches on it!

16.「<pc>さん！ マスターキーを| 取り出してもらってもいいでンスか！？<yes: <pc>! Can I have the Master Key taken|out, please!<yesno><close>

18.「<pc>さんが 特訓をこなしたおかげで| キーに パワーが たまったでンス。|: Thanks to <pc>'s training, the keys|have more power. Thanks to this, the limiter|has been lifted.

19.「さあ その マスターキーを使って| ボクの二段目の引き出しを 開くでンス。|:
Now, use that Master Key to open my second|drawer. I'll use the master key to open my|second drawer and take out whatever's in|
|there.

20.<pc>は タンスの引き出しを開け|中に入っていた本を 取り出した！: <pc> opens a Wardrobe drawer and|removes a book from inside!

21.「その本は ご主人さまが長年の研究の末に| 編み出したという どうぐ使いの必殺技:
The book was a manual that contained the|master's method of mastering the special|techniques of item masters, a method he had|
|developed after years of research.

22.「その本を読めば どうぐ使いの必殺技が| 習得できるはずでンスよ。: If you read that book, you should be able to|learn the item master's special technique.

23.<pc>は|『どうぐ使い必殺技マニュアル』と|書かれた本を 読んだ。: <pc> read a book called "A Manual of|Special Techniques for Item Masters".

25.「その必殺技があれば 隊長ゴルゴンザとの| 戦いを 優位に進められるはずでンス。: With that special move, he should have the|upper hand in the fight against Captain|Gorgonza.

26.「……と言いたいところでンスが| すでに 必殺技を習得してるようでンスね。| で:
I'd like to say, "I've already mastered a|special move..." but it seems you've already|mastered a special move. Then, please try this|
|instead.

27.「前に ご主人さまには 夢があると言ったのを| 覚えてるでンスか？: Remember when I said the master had a dream?

28.「じつは 隊長ゴルゴンザを倒すことこそが| ご主人さまの夢だったでンスよ。| そ: In fact, defeating Captain Gorgonza was the|master's dream. And it is my dream too.

29.タンスが 自分の戸棚を開けると|なんと たくさんの どうぐが飛び出した！: Wardrobe opens his cupboard, and lo and|behold, out pops a whole bunch of items!

30.「ボクの中には ご主人さまが集めてた| アストルティアで使われている どうぐが|: Inside me are many of the items used in|Astoltia that Master collected.

31.「魔界にいた頃から ご主人さまは| この世界の住人が作った どうぐを| 集めるこ: Ever since he was in Demon World, Master had a|hobby of collecting items made by the|inhabitants of this world.

32.「この世界のどうぐに魅せられた ご主人さまは| やがて 好きが高じて どうぐの能: The master was fascinated by the items of this|world, and his love for them eventually led|him into researching their abilities...

33.「だけど 魔界の連中は 意味のない研究などせず| 強化薬の開発を続けるよう いつ:
However, the people of Demon World always,|always, always insisted to the master to|continue the development of enhancement drugs|
|instead of meaningless research...

34.「ある日 ご主人さまは 自分の研究の価値を| 証明すべく どうぐを使った 自作の:
One day, in order to prove the value of his|research, the master challenged Gorgonza to a|battle with a battle weapon of his own making|
|using items.

35.「その戦闘兵器こそが このボク……| バトルガジェット１号 タンスだったでンスよ: That battle weapon was me...Battle Gadget No.|1, Wardrobe.

36.「ボクは ご主人さまの期待に応えようと| 隊長ゴルゴンザと戦ったでンスが ボロボ: I fought Captain Gorgonza to live up to my|master's expectations, but I was beaten so|badly that I could never fight again...

37.「敗北を喫した ご主人さまは アイツに勝つには| どうぐの扱いに長けた アストル:
The defeated master decided that the only way|to defeat him was to enlist the help of the|residents of Astoltia, who were skilled in|
|handling items.

38.「そして ご主人さまとボクは この世界に来て| 最初に出会った者に キーを与えた: And the master and I gave the key to the first|person we met when we came to this world. That|was <pc>.

39.「<pc>さん……。ご主人さまの研究を| カケラも理解しようとしなかった あの巨:
...I would like you to show the|strength of your item master to that giant who|didn't try to understand even a shred of your|
|master's research.

40.「今のうちに 修行して | あの巨人を倒す 心の準備ができたら| また ここに戻: I want you to train while you still can, and|when you're ready to defeat that giant, I want|you to come back here again.

41.「ボクは それまでに| 奴らの居場所を 探しておくでンス。: I'll try to locate them before then.

42.「ご主人さまは 隊長ゴルゴンザを倒すという夢を| <pc>さんに 託したでンスよ: The master entrusted <pc> with the|dream of defeating Captain Gorgonza. It is my|dream too...

43.「ご主人さまの研究の価値を カケラも| 理解しようとしなかった あの巨人に| ど:
I want you to show the strength of your item|master to that giant who didn't understand|even a shred of the value of your master's|
|research.

44.「修行して もっと強い どうぐ使いになったら| また ここに戻ってきてほしいでン:
I hope you'll come back here when you've|trained and become a stronger item master. In|the meantime, I'm going to find out where they|
|are!

45.「ご主人さまは 隊長ゴルゴンザを倒すという夢を| <pc>さんに 託したでンスよ: The master entrusted <pc> with the|dream of defeating Captain Gorgonza. It is my|dream too...

46.「ご主人さまの研究の価値を カケラも| 理解しようとしなかった あの巨人に| ど:
I want you to show the strength of your item|master to that giant who didn't understand|even a shred of the value of your master's|
|research.

47.「あの巨人を倒す 心の準備ができたら| また ここに戻ってきてほしいでンスよ。|: I want you to come back here when you're ready|to defeat the Titans. In the meantime, I want|you to find out where they are!

48.「おお！ ありがたいでンス！| では 必殺技を習得するための準備として| やって: Oh! Thank you! Now, there is something I want|you to do in preparation for learning the|special moves.

49.「おお！ ありがたいでンス！| ありがたいでンスが…………: Oh! Thank you! Thank you, but...

50.「<pc>さんは 頼まれごとで| いっぱいでンスね……。でも 急ぎでンスから|: I've got a lot of requests for the|<pc>... but I'm in a hurry, so I'll|get that taken care of quickly!

51.「そうでンスか……。でも この世界で| 頼れるのは <pc>さんだけでンス。|: I see... but the only thing we can rely on in|this world is <pc>. I'll be waiting|for you, believing in you.
